Maria Lopez.description: conversing about Klaus and Maria are making plans to meet at 6:00 pm at Hobbs Cafe to try out the vegan options and some of Maria's favorite dishes. @ <persona> Klaus Mueller
chat: Maria Lopez
Hey Klaus! How are you doing today?
Klaus Mueller
Hey Maria! I'm doing well, thank you. How about you?
Maria Lopez
I'm doing great, thanks! Are you going to the physics lecture today?
Klaus Mueller
I'm actually focusing on my sociology research paper today, so I won't be able to make it to the physics lecture.
Maria Lopez
That's cool, good luck with your research paper! By the way, have you tried the vegan options at Hobbs Cafe? They're really good.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you, Maria! I haven't tried the vegan options yet, but I'll definitely check them out.
Maria Lopez
If you need any recommendations, feel free to ask me! I've tried almost everything on the menu.
Klaus Mueller
Thank you, Maria! I'll be sure to ask you for recommendations when I check out the vegan options at Hobbs Cafe.
Maria Lopez
By the way, do you want to join me for dinner later at Hobbs Cafe? I can show you some of my favorite vegan dishes.
Klaus Mueller
That sounds great, Maria! I'd love to join you for dinner at Hobbs Cafe and try out some of your favorite vegan dishes. What time should we meet?
Maria Lopez
Great! Let's meet at 6:00 pm at Hobbs Cafe then. Looking forward to it!
Klaus Mueller
Should I bring anything for dinner, Maria?
Maria Lopez
No need to bring anything, Klaus! Just bring your appetite. See you at 6:00 pm at Hobbs Cafe!
Klaus Mueller
Thank you, Maria! I'm looking forward to trying out the vegan options at Hobbs Cafe with you. See you at 6:00 pm!
Maria Lopez
Great! See you at 6:00 pm at Hobbs Cafe!
